
soft computing : 
pip install 
minisom 
neurodynex 
fuzzywuzzy 
python-Levenshtein 
scikit-fuzzy 
networkx numpy 
scipy 
matplotlib

run on normal  cmd :
docker pull cassandra
docker run --name cassandra_db -p 9042:9042 -d cassandra
docker ps -a
wait for a minute 
docker logs -f cassandra_db= sttaus at end may besucessful then only run next
docker exec -it cassandra_db cqlsh  
cqlsh>

start dokcer desktop and run 
docker run -d --name rstudio -p 8787:8787 -e PASSWORD=student rocker/rstudio
  

Opens it on http://localhost:8787

Username = rstudio

Password = student
##
pandas pip install opencv-python
